DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy safety two non-preserved artificial tear , ( carboxymethylcellulose 0.5 % , + glycerin 0.9 % vs. sodium hyaluronate 0.18 % ) eye drop treatment sign symptom dry eye disease .
DOC.brief_title: Study Compare Efficacy Safety Two Non-Preserved Artificial Tears Treatment Dry Eye Signs Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Current use artificial tear product least 2 time per day ( e.g . relief dry eye symptom dryness ) . Be likely complete entire course study comply appropriate instruction Have undergone refractive surgery ( e.g. , cataract surgery , PRK , LASIK , surgery involve limbal corneal incision ) within last 12 month . Have uncontrolled systemic disease Are currently use , use within 14 day study enrollment , ocular medication artificial tear Have anticipate contact lens wear study Have active ocular infection
